channel.title: UK Election?
channel.description:
Who are you voting for? As for me, I think the Green Party, although they're gonna fuck everything else up,
The Green Party believes that the prohibition of drugs does not work. It supports the legalisation of the possession, trade and cultivation of cannabis. It would decriminalise small-scale possession of recreational drugs like ecstasy and gradually move towards the legalisation of all recreational drugs. It hopes that this would "take the drug trade out of criminal control and place it within a regulated and controlled legal environment"
sounds good.

item.title: UK Election?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

I saw a small excerpt of the debate, and I’m just wondering: is the average 50 year old Brit like Brown?

not really, no. he’s scottish, maybe that has something to do with it?

R.I.P RSC:

Or is he secretly Darth Vader, with his gasps for breath at the end of every sentence.

darth vader doesn’t extend his lower jaw to breath in, so no.

R.I.P RSC:

I don’t like conservatives, and Brown doesn’t look like a good representative of a labour party.

you should have seen brown before, he’s improved on his image a lot since becoming prime minister.

Read full topic

item.title: UK Election?
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I saw a small excerpt of the debate, and I’m just wondering: is the average 50 year old Brit like Brown? A cocky father hen (ya)? Or is he secretly Darth Vader, with his gasps for breath at the end of every sentence. It just annoys me, like the annoying twitches Herr Nick Griffin has.

But yea, I only saw an excerpt of the debate, so my opinion doesn’t matter, even more so because I’m not British. I don’t like conservatives, and Brown doesn’t look like a good representative of a labour party. So I guess Clegg is the best man. OH AND HE’S 50% DUTCH SO HE MUST BE ÜBER!

Read full topic

item.title: UK Election?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“chri5, post:9, topic:337737”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=434138.msg3187849#msg3187849 date=1271954646]

This is the first time I’ve been slightly interested in UK politics and from looking at the Conservative ad Lib Dems policies, I say vote Labour.

Yeah, cuz that’s worked well for the past 10 years.

You might want to look into the Liberal Democrats drug policies, if you’re interested in fighting prohibition but want a party with a bit more might.
[/quote]
Nick Clegg said something about how Mephedrone was handled and it being banned too slow.[/quote]

i can’t remember exactly, but i think he also commented on how the banning was illegal and shouldn’t have been handled by the now-incapable advisory council on drugs

http://www.tdpf.org.uk/lib%20dem%20drugs%20policy%20paper47.pdf

Read full topic

item.title: UK Election?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

[quote=“R.I.P RSC, post:4, topic:337737”]So drugs are the only thing you care about?

Something similar is going on in the Netherlands, but it can also be seen among the followers of the BNP. They hear one thing, "get rid of niggurs’’, they agree and then they vote for that party. The BNP/PVV voters have no idea what the other plans of these idiotic parties really are.

Sometimes you have to let go of some points you think are important in order to see points that actually matter become reality.[/quote]
It affects my life the most really, don’t really want to be put in prison for 5 years for having some weed…

Read full topic

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

So drugs are the only thing you care about?

Something similar is going on in the Netherlands, but it can also be seen among the followers of the BNP. They hear one thing, "get rid of niggurs’’, they agree and then they vote for that party. The BNP/PVV voters have no idea what the other plans of these idiotic parties really are.

Sometimes you have to let go of some points you think are important in order to see points that actually matter become reality.

item.title: UK Election?
item.dc:creator: @chri5 chri5
item.description:
@chri5 wrote:

Speljohan:

Well arent you the smart one, voting for a party because they have 1 opinion you share. GG faggot, it’s people like you that make elections useless

Have you seen the other party’s drug policies? Labour has banned BZP, synthetic cannabinoids and Mephedrone. Even upgrading Cannabis to a Class B drug and firing the ACMD leader because of a report published on Alcohol and Tobacco being more toxic/addictive than Cannabis and other recreational drugs…
